org.jcp.jsr94.tck.model
Class Invoice

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.jcp.jsr94.tck.model.Invoice
public class Invoice
extends java.lang.Object

This class defines the Invoice business object that is part of the JSR-94 TCK. The Invoice class is a simple class that contains the following properties:

  • description
  • amount
  • status
